title: Application Opens
description: Are you interested in running for a position? Not sure where to start? We encourage any interested student to pursue a leadership positions on the ASI Board of Directors and Cal State LA Academic Senate by filing the application by the required deadline.

title: Own It! ASI Info Session 1
description: Need to know more? We got you! Join us for an 'Own it' info session and find out how you can Own it in 2025-2026. As part of student government, students can network, gain leadership experience, and be the voice for students. If elected, you will be able to help the students of Cal State LA and assist with essential changes on campus. Stop by this info session to learn about the election process, available positions, and more.

title: Own It! ASI Info Session 2
description: If you didn't stop by our previous info session, you can stop by this one. Join us for an 'Own it' info session and find out how you can Own it in 2025-2026. As part of student government, students can network, gain leadership experience, and be the voice for students. If elected, you will be able to help the students of Cal State LA and assist with essential changes on campus. Stop by this info session to learn about the election process, available positions, and more.

title: Own It! ASI Info Session 3
description: If you didn't stop by our previous info session, you can stop by this one. Join us for an 'Own it' info session and find out how you can Own it in 2025-2026. As part of student government, students can network, gain leadership experience, and be the voice for students. title: Application Deadline
description: Please complete your application by this date.

title: Candidate Campaign Week
description: Meet the candidates representing you at Cal State LA. Discover their ideas, ask questions, and learn about their passions for our community. Join us to find the best representative for your student voice.

title: Voting Week
description: Your Voice, Your Vote! Vote online for your student representatives through the Cal State LA GET System.

title: Bite the Vote
description: Bite the Vote! Help shape the future of your campus by voting for your student representatives. Enjoy music, food, and a lively atmosphere while you make your voice heard. Food will be available while supplies last—don’t miss out!

title: Goodie Vote
description: Missed your chance to vote yesterday? There’s still time! Cast your ballot for your student representatives and pick up a free goodie bag while supplies last. Stop by and make your vote count!

title: Election Results Announcement
description: Join us at the Main Campus Walkway for our election announcement. Come meet your new representatives for the 2025 to 2026 academic year!
